text: void example(int* &p, double* q){ cout << "p = " << *p << endl; cout << "g = " << *q << endl; p = new int; q = new double; b ) *q = 6.28; H int main(){ int *a; double *bj a = new int; b = new double; *a = 37; *b = 3.14; example(a,b); cout << "a = " << *a << endl; cout << "b = " << *b << endl; } 3
